title: HGTV star Christina Anstead welcomes baby boy, reveals his global-inspired name
text:
Oh, boy! HGTV star Christina Anstead's family is growing.

The "Christina on the Coast" star, 36, announced the arrival of her baby boy with television host husband Ant Anstead, 40, on Instagram Friday.

"Ant and I are so excited to welcome Hudson London Anstead into the world," she wrote, captioning a picture of herself holding the newborn in a hospital bed with Ant. "Our hearts are SO full of love and joy! 💙 Our healthy baby boy was born this morning- 9/6/19."

Ant, host of the British car show "Wheelers Dealers," shared the same picture on his social media account: "Welcome to the world… I am in awe! Mummy and baby are simply perfect!"

HGTV star Christina Anstead: Pregnancy makes newlywed life 'a little crazy'

Baby Hudson, who was born at 7 lbs 7 oz, is Anstead and Ant's first child together.

Anstead also has daughter Taylor, 9, and son Brayden, 3, with ex-husband and "Flip or Flop" co-star Tarek El Moussa. Ant has a son and daughter from his first marriage.

The couple tied the knot during a surprise ceremony at their Newport Beach home in December.

Pregnant celebrities 2019: Who's due, baby bump pics and gender reveals

Christina Anstead and Ant Anstead attend the Los Angeles Special Screening Of Discovery's More

In May, Anstead told USA TODAY that she was excited to start a family with Ant after experiencing "love at first sight."

"I felt like I had known him forever, and we’re just super comfortable with each other," she said. "We just have a great relationship, he’s amazing. He’s super caring and understanding, and he really motivates me and supports me."

Anstead added: "He's awesome with my children and he’s already an amazing dad, but I’m looking forward to having a baby with him as well."

The couple announced that they were expecting their first child together in March. And it was Anstead's ex-husband who accidentally spilled the beans on the baby's gender.

Contributing: Erin Jensen

More: Tarek El Moussa spills the beans on ex Christina Anstead's baby with new husband

This article originally appeared on USA TODAY: HGTV star Christina Anstead welcomes baby boy, reveals his name
description: Oh, boy! HGTV star Christina Anstead's family is growing. She announced the arrival of her baby boy with husband Ant Anstead on Instagram Friday.
